## Terminology

![](./images/01-trigonometry/triangles-all.svg)

:::: {.columns }
::: {.column width="60%"}
Different kinds of triangles:

- **Right-angled**: one angle exactly $90^\circ$
- **Obtuse**: one angle greater than $90^\circ$
- **Acute**: all angles less than $90^\circ$
